# run_biber_from_folder { #pybiber.pipeline.run_biber_from_folder }

```python
pipeline.run_biber_from_folder(
    directory,
    model='en_core_web_sm',
    disable_ner=True,
    n_process=CONFIG.DEFAULT_N_PROCESS,
    batch_size=CONFIG.DEFAULT_BATCH_SIZE,
    recursive=False,
    return_tokens=False,
    normalize=True,
    force_ttr=False,
)
```

One-liner: read -> parse -> biber() from a folder of .txt files.
